description:
<p>Priory Hospital Bristol is part of the Healthcare Division of Priory Group and has 86 beds over eight wards varying from Eating Disorders, Acute Mental Health, Acquired Brain Injury, Adult PICU, Huntingdon’s and Dementia, private addiction and general psychiatry.</p>
<p> This is a role for an experienced Speech and Language therapist who has experience in neuro disorders and difficulties. Working across 2 rehab wards with up to 18 patients, we are looking for someone to offer individual support based on patient needs. This could include any difficulty with communication, eating, drinking and swallowing. An opportunity to work with longer stay inpatients to support individual rehab and be a part of a therapies team including OT, OTAs, Physio and Psychology</p>
title: Speech and Language Therapist
